title: Ryze Main Club
body:
So listen folks!
I'm a {{champion:13}} -main and i still don't have a {{champion:13}} Club to have the "{{champion:13}}" tag, or something similar, as club tag.
So everyone who wants to join my club, {{champion:13}} -main or not, you're welcome in my club !
Written,
Best{{champion:13}}Zymbabwe

Ps: just add me on EUW : BestRyzeZymbabwe.{{summoner:12}}
